title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 187: Featuring Sam Cosentino + Dennis Bonvie
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Sam Cosentino and Dennis Bonvie. Sam joins to break down all things NHL Draft while Dennis joins to tell some stories, update us on his current job and a bunch more. The boys also break down all the NHL news that has happened in the past week including the Subban trade, Marleau trade, Miller trade and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
